body:
Hello,

The Officials will be meeting this weekend about a lot of different things, especially Tourney #2.

Anything you guys want to be discussed? Leave it here, and we'll do our best to discuss it in the limited time we have.
body_tagged:

title: Official Meeting.

replies.body:
Ehh, map based on gameplay. Make The maps have different paths that you need certain skill or knowleadge about to be good at. Fix the god damn blocklag and knockback issues. If there is going to be a TDM TOURNAMENT WHERE I CANT TAKE ANY KB BUT KNOCK SOMEONE 10 BLOCKS BACK IN TWO HITS im done.
Also train the streamers to sound more proffesional. 

On scrim servers you should be able to kick, op/deop people, whitelist one person and just have to type /GM 1 instead of /gamemode Robin_DD_J c.
